alert.note: Alert for Owyhee Mountains; Southern Twin Falls County; Southwest Highlands; Western Magic Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 01 at 2:53AM MST until December 03 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM SATURDAY TO 5 AM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of south central and southwest Idaho. * WHEN...From 2 PM Saturday to 5 AM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Gusty winds will cause areas of blowing and drifting snow above 5000 feet.|
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Owyhee Mountains; Southern Twin Falls County; Southwest Highlands; Western Magic Valley
